Modafil is a prescription medication that has been used to treat conditions such as narcolepsy sleep apnea shift work disorder attention deficit hyperactivity Disorders (ADHD) depression anxiety stress fatigue insomnia weight loss bodybuilding athletes performance improvement etceteras However it can also have some side effects like headaches nauseavision problems dizziness dry mouth skin rash hairloss stiffness muscle cramps joint pain backache neckpain chest painsome people may experience these symptoms more frequently than others depending on their individual tolerance threshold dosage frequency duration intensity timing combination with other substances or underlying health issues so please consult your doctor before taking any new supplements especially if you are already under medical treatment! 💊❓</s>
